channel.title: Power on Mark LeBoeuf
channel.description: Recent content in Power on Mark LeBoeuf

item.title: Monte Carlo Power Calculations for Mixed Effects Models
item.description: That’s a dense title – Monte Carlo Simulation, Power, Mixed-Effect models. Each of these topics could be their own post. However, I’m going to discuss their interrelations in the context of experimental power and keep everything high-level. The goal is to get an intuitive idea of how we can leverage simulation to provide sample size estimates for experiments with nested data.
